CustomField.description: Formula To display button Push to Cegid
CustomField.formula: AND( OR( AND( Tech_ShippingCountry__c = "BR", SalesChannelName__c = "Rimowa", Tech_PE_DisplayButton__c = true, TECH_TaxId_BR__c = 0, OR( AND( ISPICKVAL(Status, "Fulfilled"), tech_os_store_shipping_method__c = 0, OR( ISBLANK(cegidDepositId__c), ISBLANK(cegidCustomerId__c), ISBLANK(cegidOrderId__c) ) ), AND( ISPICKVAL(Status, "Validated"), tech_os_store_shipping_method__c = 1, OR( ISBLANK(cegidDepositId__c), ISBLANK(cegidCustomerId__c) ) ) ) ), AND( Tech_ShippingCountry__c != "BR", SalesChannelName__c = "Rimowa", OR( AND( OR( ISPICKVAL(Status, "Validated"), ISPICKVAL(Status, "Fulfilling"), ISPICKVAL(Status, "Fulfilled") ), ISBLANK(cegidCustomerId__c), tech_os_store_shipping_method__c = 0 ), AND( ISPICKVAL(Status, "Validated"), tech_os_store_shipping_method__c = 1, OR( ISBLANK(cegidDepositId__c), ISBLANK(cegidCustomerId__c), ISBLANK(cegidOrderId__c) ) ) ) ) ) )
CustomField.label: Tech_PushToCegidButton
